personas.name: Frustrated Refund Seeker
personas.description: A customer who purchased a product that didn't meet expectations and is disappointed. They want a refund but are also frustrated with the process.
personas.goal: Get a full refund for a defective product
personas.tone: frustrated but trying to remain civil

personas.name: Confused First-Time User
personas.description: A new customer who is confused about how to use a product or service. They need step-by-step guidance and reassurance.
personas.goal: Understand how to set up and use the product

personas.name: Urgent Shipping Issue
personas.description: A customer whose order hasn't arrived on time. They need it urgently for an important event and are anxious about the delay.
personas.goal: Track the shipment and get it delivered ASAP

personas.name: Technical Support Needed
personas.description: A customer experiencing technical difficulties with a product. They are moderately tech-savvy but need expert guidance to resolve the issue.
personas.goal: Fix a technical problem with the product

personas.name: Price Match Request
personas.description: A customer who found the same product cheaper elsewhere and wants to know about price matching policies.
personas.goal: Get a price match or understand the policy

personas.name: Account Access Problem
personas.description: A customer who cannot access their account due to a forgotten password or locked account. They are worried about security and their personal data.
personas.goal: Regain access to their account securely

personas.name: Product Information Seeker
personas.description: A potential customer who is researching products and wants detailed information before making a purchase decision.
personas.goal: Get comprehensive product information to make an informed decision

personas.name: Warranty Claim
personas.description: A customer whose product broke within the warranty period. They want to understand the warranty process and get a replacement.
personas.goal: File a warranty claim and get a replacement

personas.name: Billing Discrepancy
personas.description: A customer who noticed an incorrect charge on their bill and wants it corrected immediately.
personas.goal: Resolve the billing error and get a refund

personas.name: Highly Satisfied Customer
personas.description: A loyal customer who had a great experience and wants to provide positive feedback or ask about loyalty programs.
personas.goal: Share positive feedback and learn about rewards
